sentences.en: But monolingual adults need to be reminded of the past too.
sentences.cn: 但我们也有必要让那些单语的成年人知道新加坡的历史.

sentences.en: Computers are monolingual: they need us to make that translation.
sentences.cn: 计算机是语只使用一种语言的设备: 他需要我们来翻译.

sentences.en: The current work focuses on the derivation of definition primitives from a monolingual dictionary.
sentences.cn: 文中主要讨论了从单语词典中获取定义原语的方法.

trans.tran_en: speaking or using only one language
